El_Monte.Rio Hondo Preparatory School:
Rio Hondo Preparatory School, familiarly known as Rio Hondo Prep, RHP or simply Rio, is a day school for grades 6–12. Founded in 1964, it is located in Arcadia, California.


== Facilities ==
School facilities include an office building, a classroom building, a brand new gym set to open in February 2012, many athletic facilities and a concession stand.
